page.title: 17FARM STUDY-IVY HOUSE FARM 2
page.content: The other 6 hectares are used for potatoes.They are sold locally or fed to the cows.Pre-emergence{weedkiller} is used on the winter corn and post emergence on the spring corn.{ {Insecticides}have not been used except once in the past 25 years.The main purpose of the crops is to feed the dairy{cattle.}The numbers of breeds on this farm are as follows:- 4 Guernsey,42 Friesian and 1 Aberdeen Angus calf.This beef calf is the result of the{farming}practice of{ {breeding}a small beef bred bull (artificial insemination) with small heifers and the less good cows to produce small beef calves for sale.The better cows are inseminated with sperm from the Milk Marketing Board bull nominated by Mr Willis.The calves being brought up to replace losses in the herd.
